creator: verbose002@yahoo.com
text:
When you combine apache and tomcat with Coyote JK2 Connector,
if you make a request with HTTP 1.0, like this:

[GET / HTTP/1.0]

then it returns it's source code.

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
This looks like a configuration error. Please follow up on the tomcat-user 
mailing list.
